verbs.description: [V: Thank] [ARG1: Jeff Sessions , Rod Rosenstein and Robert Mueller] [ARG2: for running Justice and the Russia probe by the book despite extreme pressure from Donald Trump] .
Thank [ARG0: Jeff Sessions , Rod Rosenstein and Robert Mueller] for [V: running] [ARG1: Justice and the Russia probe] [ARGM-MNR: by the book] [ARGM-ADV: despite extreme pressure from Donald Trump] .
